title: Restaurants Near Conference Venue
subtitle: Discover great dining options within walking distance of Salle St Nicolas in Issy-les-Moulineaux. From traditional French cuisine to international flavors, find the perfect place for your meals during the conference.

search.noResults: No restaurants found matching your criteria.

tips.title: Dining Tips
items: Most restaurants in France serve lunch between 12:00-14:30 and dinner from 19:00 onwards
Reservations are recommended, especially for dinner
Many restaurants are closed on Sundays or Mondays - check before visiting
Tipping is not mandatory but 5-10% is appreciated for good service
Most restaurants accept card payments, but it's good to have some cash
